title: "R Notebook"
output: html_notebook

```{r}
COVID_cases %>%
    distinct(variable)
 
    
```
```{r}
COVID_cases %>%
    filter(variable == "Testing - Cumulative people tested for COVID-19 - Total") %>% 
    ggplot() +
    aes(x = date, y = value, group = variable) +
    geom_line()
```

```{r}
COVID_cases %>% 
    filter(str_detect(variable, "Testing - Cumulative") &
               !str_detect(variable, "Total")) %>%
    arrange(date)


%>% 
    pivot_wider(names_from = variable, values_from = value) %>% 
    ggplot() +
    aes(x = date, y = value, group = variable, colour = variable) +
    geom_line() +
    theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, size = 1),
          axis.text.y = element_text(size = 1),
          legend.position = "bottom")

data
values_fn = {summary_fun}
```
